actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to replace the current earned income credit and the personal exemption for children with a refundable credit for families and a refundable credit for each child, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to replace the existing earned income credit and personal exemption for children with a refundable family credit and a refundable credit for each child under 18 years old.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to replace the current earned income credit and the personal exemption for children with a refundable credit for families and a refundable credit for each child, and for other purposes.
